snippet.title: Sonic Freedom Proof-Of-Concept Trailer
snippet.description:
Disclaimer: This is not playable (yet), this is merely a visualization of what I want to accomplish.

An on-going passion project, this is the trailer of my dream game for Sonic. It took over 300+ hours to make; everything was either hand drawn, hand-animated by myself. The only assets I didn't create were the sound effects.

Thanks for taking the time to view this. 

Special thanks to Sound of a Shadow for the sick beat! Check out his channel https://www.youtube.com/user/SoundOfAShadow

And also to killa-byte007 for helping with some of the badniks. Check out his DeviantArt: http://killa-byte007.deviantart.com


Made using: 

Adobe Photoshop CS5
Adobe AfterEffects CS5
Adobe Flash CS5
Edited in Cyberlink PowerDirector 15


Follow me on Facebook: facebook.com/tripplejaz
DeviantArt: tripplejaz.deviantart.com/
twitter: @tripplejaz
